step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nicely done squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to make the motion a smooth circle.
Great job completing the first repetition! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll.
Second rep starting well. Focus on initiating the roll from your shoulder blades.
Excellent control in squeezing your shoulder blades. Ensure the movement feels fluid and circular.
Fantastic finish to your second repetition! You're improving shoulder mobility effectively.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth, circular motion. Keep up the deep breaths to maximize the benefits for lymphatic flow and oxygen.
